name: quick-draw

effect.sword_shield: If a Pokémon with this Ability selects a damaging move, it has a 30% chance of going first in its priority bracket.

effect.legends_arceus: If a Pokémon with this Ability selects a damaging move, it has a 30% chance of going first in its priority bracket.

short_effect: Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally.
